rateLimit.title: Service Temporarily Unavailable
rateLimit.description: The map service has reached its usage limit for this period. This is a free service and usage is limited to ensure availability for everyone.
rateLimit.suggestion: Please try again later or check back tomorrow when limits reset.

auth.title: Map Service Error
auth.description: There was an authentication issue with the map service. This may be a temporary issue.

network.title: Connection Error
network.description: Unable to connect to the map service. Please check your internet connection.
network.suggestion: Make sure you have a stable internet connection and try again.

unknown.title: Something Went Wrong
unknown.description: An unexpected error occurred while loading the map.

trains.title: Unable to load trains
trains.network: Network connection issue. Please check your internet connection.
trains.unavailable: Train data temporarily unavailable. Retrying automatically...
trains.generic: An error occurred while loading train data.
